ingredients.raw: 2 1/2 pounds (1.14 kg) medium starch yellow potatoes (such as Yukon Golds), peeled and cut into 1- to 2-inch cubes

expected.item: medium starch yellow potatoes (such as Yukon Golds)
expected.note: peeled and cut into 1- to 2-inch cubes

ingredients.raw: 4 medium scallions (1 1/2 ounces; 43 g total), white and green parts thinly sliced and divided

expected.note: white and green parts thinly sliced and divided

ingredients.raw: 6 tablespoons (85 g) unsalted butter, plus more for serving
1/2 head small cabbage (1 pound; 455 g), halved lengthwise, cored, then cut crosswise into 1/2-inch-thick slices (about 3 cups)

expected.item: small cabbage, halved lengthwise, cored, then cut crosswise into 1/2-inch-thick slices

ingredients.raw: 3/4 cup (180 ml) whole milk, plus more as needed
2 tablespoons finely chopped laver seaweed (also sold in sheets as nori; optional, see notes)

expected.note: also sold in sheets as nori; optional, see notes

ingredients.raw: 1 tablespoon (9 g) Diamond Crystal kosher salt, plus more to taste; for table salt use half as much by volume

expected.note: plus more to taste; for table salt use half as much by volume

ingredients.raw: 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, plus more for garnish
